name: BNNSLayerParametersLossBase
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a loss layer.

items.name: init(function: BNNSLossFunction, i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, reduction: BNNSLossReductionFunction)
items.desc: Returns a new loss layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new loss layer parameters structure.

items.name: var function: BNNSLossFunction
items.desc: The function that’s used to compute loss.

items.name: var reduction: BNNSLossReductionFunction
items.desc: The function that’s used to reduce the computed loss.
